bibl.bibl: Falconer, Hugh, et al. 1863. An account of the proceedings of the late conference held in France to inquire into the circumstances attending the asserted discovery of a human jaw in the gravel at Moulin-Quignon, near Abbeville; including the Procès Verbaux of the sittings of the conference, with notes thereon. Natural History Review n.s. 3: 423–62.
